alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 9:21AM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snowfall of 2 to 3 inches in the lower elevations, and 3 to 6 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Jackson Hole. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially over Teton and Togwotee Passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please monitor the Bridger-Teton Avalanche Center at JHAVALANCHE.ORG, if your plans include travel into the backcountry. Backcountry enthusiasts can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
